original_text: You asked me a question about people who have not yet married. The Lord has not told me any special rule about this. But I will tell you what I myself think about it. The Lord has been very kind to me. You know that you can believe what I say.
korean_text: 처녀에 대하여는 내가 주께 받은 계명이 없으되 주의 자비하심을 받아서 충성스러운 자가 된 내가 의견을 말하노니

sentences.original_text: about people who have not yet married
The Lord has not told me
what I myself think about it
sentences.korean_translation: 제가 그것에 대해 직접 생각하는 것을

sentences.original_text: The Lord has been very kind to me
You know that you can believe
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 믿을 수 있다는 것을 압니다
